title: SAV RAKARA
description: The stellar career of Villian Dameheart Ministry was about to end.The former editor-in-chief of T&M Media was removed by her own company after she put out a controversial article that condemns a few alleged corrupt personalities who were running for office including the prominent Gallafort family who co-owns the media network.Depressed and frustrated, she goes on a long vacation and accidentally meets one of the younger members of the Gallafort family, Redstart. They develop an unlikely friendship as they discover the secrets of an old book that came from another world.
author: Juddy Anderson C. Punzalan
